se.cbb.jprime.math

Class UniformDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.math.UniformDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Continuous1DPD, Continuous1DPDDependent, ProbabilityDistribution, Dependent, ProperDependent

    public class UniformDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
implements Continuous1DPDDependent
    Represents a 1-D continuous uniform distribution U(a,b). It is possible to let the distribution rely on two floating point state parameters and act as a Dependent.
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

      Constructor for when the distribution relies on state parameters.

      • UniformDistribution

        public UniformDistribution(DoubleParameter p1,
                   DoubleParameter p2,
                   boolean isLeftOpen,
                   boolean isRightOpen)
        Constructor for when the distribution relies on state parameters. The distribution will add itself as a child dependent of the parameters.
        Parameters:
        p1 - the first parameter a.
        p2 - the second parameter b.
        isLeftOpen - true for (a,... and false for [a,...
        isRightOpen - true for ...,b) and false for ...,b].

      • cacheAndUpdate

        public void cacheAndUpdate(java.util.Map<Dependent,ChangeInfo> changeInfos,
                  boolean willSample)
        Description copied from interface: ProperDependent
        Caches and updates this object. It may be assumed that this method will only be invoked if a parent has in fact changed.
        Input: All changes made so far, i.e., changes to dependent objects which precede this in the dependency DAG.
        Output: Changes made to this object are added to the input.

        Behaviour must adhere to the following:

        1. This objects queries input for change info of its parents.
        2. This object caches.
        3. This object sets its own change info (null if it has not changed).
        4. Exit.
        Specified by:
        cacheAndUpdate in interface ProperDependent
        Parameters:
        changeInfos - all changes made so far, including those of this objects parents, if any (null is interpreted as no change).
        willSample - true if the pending state will be sampled; false if not sampled. Invariant over any cacheAndUpdate()-clearCache()/restoreCache() cycle.

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache(boolean willSample)
        Description copied from interface: ProperDependent
        Clears the cached (old) state when a proposed state has been accepted. It may be assumed that this method will only be invoked if a parent has in fact changed.
        Specified by:
        clearCache in interface ProperDependent
        Parameters:
        willSample - true if the pending state will be sampled; false if not sampled. Invariant over any cacheAndUpdate()-clearCache()/restoreCache() cycle.

      • restoreCache

        public void restoreCache(boolean willSample)
        Description copied from interface: ProperDependent
        Restores the cached state when a proposed state has been rejected. It may be assumed that this method will only be invoked if a parent has in fact changed. Note that if the willSample flag is true, it may be necessary to do additional pre-processing on the restored state (since it probably originates from an earlier non-sample iteration).
        Specified by:
        restoreCache in interface ProperDependent
        Parameters:
        willSample - true if the pending state will be sampled; false if not sampled. Invariant over any cacheAndUpdate()-clearCache()/restoreCache() cycle.

      • getParentDependents

        public Dependent[] getParentDependents()
        Description copied from interface: ProperDependent
        Returns all dependents on which this object relies, i.e. the parents of this vertex in the corresponding DAG.
        Specified by:
        getParentDependents in interface ProperDependent
        Returns:
        all parent dependents.
